@confirmAndSend.description: Button label for confirming and sending an email

@noEmailInfo.description: Message when no email information is available

@finalConfirmation.description: Title for the final confirmation screen

@copyToYourEmail.description: Text explaining that a copy will be sent to the user's email

@previewEmail.description: Button label for previewing email before sending

@confirmAndSendEmail.description: Button label for confirming and sending email
